crons.monolith.soft_declines module¶

Hard Declines

Fetches hard declines and adds a fake SMS message to the associated account so agents are aware of the issue.

crons.monolith.soft_declines.run()¶

Run

Fetches all the hard declines since the last run and notifies agents of the failure

Returns

bool
